name: MYGLAMM FACE & LIP COMBO
detail: Get the festive glow on with MyGlamm Hydra-Glow – Face & Lip Combo. Begin by washing off the dirt, pollution and makeup with Glow Iridescent Brightening Foam Cleanser. Follow up with Glow Iridescent Brightening Sheet Mask for instant radiance and hydration. Lastly, choose your favourite shade of MyGlamm LIT pH Lip Balm and give your lips some A-level hydration
